**Performance Measurement Consultant - Senior Level**
==============================================

* **Reference Number:** cb-5469-71987260
* **Publication Date:** 2023-05-11
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-26T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-05-31
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal [Demande de Proposition]
-------------------------------------------------------

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a Performance Measurement Consultant to review and improve the current performance measurement approach for the Indigenous Skills and Employment Training (ISET) program. The objective is to ensure effective assessment and reporting on program impacts and progress towards reducing skills and employment gaps.

**Scope of Work:**
The consultant will identify and recommend improvements to the ISET performance measurement approach, including analysis, data collection, and reporting. Recommendations should support the identification and communication of program impacts, including the impacts of the work of the ISET Indigenous service delivery network.

**Selection Criteria:**
Bidders will be selected based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The following trade agreements apply: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

**Contracting Entity:**
Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
140 Prom du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0J9
